Finally the notifications are working now on my pebble. Caller Id is still acting weird. Some times I get the name and sometimes just the number.

Removed the watchface that shows temperature and put up my own watchface that I create on www.watchface-generator.de

Btw, I had to do the trick that is posted of pebble website to make my pebble notifications work.
http://help.getpebble.com/customer/portal/articles/1092769-setting-up-notifications—-ios

I think I’m not going to return my pebble.
